description: Defines a Flutter widget 'NoteCard' responsible for displaying individual note summaries, including title, content preview, and update date, with pinning functionality.

classes.name: NoteCard
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a note's title, content preview, timestamp, and pin icon, with tap and pin actions.

methods.name: NoteCard
methods.description: Constructor for the NoteCard widget, specifying required fields and optional dense layout.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the note card, including content preview, title, pin button, and timestamp.
